tgt_original: 5 | prītyā virāgād upekṣako viharati pratisaṃvedayati kāyena sukhaṃ bhavatyanāsravaḥ pudgalaḥ sa ucyate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamavatīrṇaḥ |
ityeṣa mārgo bhavati tṛtīyadhyānonmukhaḥ |  paśyan prītimakuśalāṃ niṣprītikaṃ sukhaṃ sākṣātkurvan dhyāyati |
6 | sukhasya prahāṇāt pūrvameva duḥkhasya prahāṇāt saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhamupasaṃpādayati caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ
